snippet: Matt Shoemaker held Japan to two hits in five scoreless innings as the M.L.B. All-Stars won the final two games of the series after losing the first three.
abstract: MLB All-Stars beat Japan, 3-1, in final game of five-game series; Japan wins series, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Matt Shoemaker held Japan to two hits in five scoreless innings as the M.L.B. All-Stars won the final two games of the series after losing the first three.
